name: Jay Z
bio_summary: Shawn Corey Carter (born December 4, 1969), best known as his stage name Jay Z, is an American rapper, businessman, and investor. Formerly known as Jay-Z, he is one of the best-selling musicians of all time, having sold more than 100 million records.

name: Kanye West
bio_summary: Kanye Omari West (born June 8, 1977) is an American rapper, songwriter, record producer, fashion designer, and entrepreneur. Born in Atlanta and raised in Chicago.
